content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(0.5, 6.0)
Consists of boiler (position 0.5, 6.0) and steam engine (position 0.5, 0.5).

### Copper plate factory at position(-5.0, -65.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position -5.0, -65.0) with a furnace source of 50 iron ore and a furnace result of 100 iron plates.
- Burner mining drill (position 47.0, -82.0) with fuel of 4 coal.
- Belt group (position 40.5, -84.5) that connects the burner mining drill to the stone furnace.

### Wooden chests
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden chest (position 46.5, -83.5) with 18 coal.
- Wooden chest (position 48.5, -83.5) with no items.
- Wooden chest (position 5.5, -79.5) with no items.
- Wooden chest (position 10.5, -79.5) with no items.
- Wooden chest (position -4.5, -63.5) with no items.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when connecting Boiler and Steam Engine
- Ensure you have enough pipes in your inventory to connect the boiler and steam engine before attempting to do so.

### Errors when placing Offshore Pump
- Ensure that the Offshore Pump is in your inventory before attempting to place it.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it.
